## {.tabset}

### Map of Regions

```{r, fig.cap=onmsR::md_caption("Figure App.F.12.17.")}
onmsR::calcofi_map()
```

### Anchovies {.active}

#### CINMS Region

```{r}
onmsR::get_figure_info("Figure App.F.12.19.hake")
grp   <- "Anchovy"
rgn   <- "CINMS"

title <- glue::glue("{grp} - {rgn} Region")
csv   <- glue::glue("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/calcofi-analysis/master/data/{grp}_{rgn}.csv")

onmsR::calcofi_plot(csv = csv, title = title)
```

`r onmsR::md_caption("Figure App.F.12.19.anchovy")`

`r onmsR::md_caption("Figure App.F.12.19.anchovy", get_details = T)`
#### SoCal Shelf Region

```{r}
onmsR::get_figure_info("Figure App.F.12.19.hake")

grp   <- "Anchovy"
rgn   <- "SoCal Shelf"

title <- glue::glue("{grp} - {rgn} Region")
csv   <- glue::glue("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/calcofi-analysis/master/data/{grp}_{rgn}.csv")

#download.file(csv, "_tmp.csv")
onmsR::calcofi_plot(csv = csv, title = title)
```
